name: Swat City War: Sniper Shooting
description:
Swat City War: Sniper Shooting Mafia is the best fps shooting game. Pull the trigger and eliminate the terrorists from your territory. Kill all the evil forces in the region and spread your name in the area
Features:
- The best real sniper helicopter
- The latest adventurous action
- These enemies are smart and clever to target
- Excellent 3D graphics and high quality
- Action packed sniper free FPS shooting game
- The looting challenge of the museum
- The first addictive action shooter game
- Adventure with modern adventure adventure gameplay
